title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 9-3.2 - Possession, Manufacture, Distribution, Sale or Offer of Sale of Flavored E-Liquid Prohibited.
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 9-3.2 - Possession, Manufacture, Distribution, Sale or Offer of Sale of Flavored E-Liquid Prohibited. State Regulations

It shall be unlawful for any individual or entity to possess, manufacture, distribute, sell or offer for sale any flavored e-liquid or product containing the same. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
9-3.2

Adopted

New

York State Register October 2, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 40, eff. 9/17/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
